content: it s part five of my seven-part crochet snowflake collection and this pattern celebrates the impact of the details a closer look will reveal a tiny star in the middle but it s the last round that hides the true secret a simple modification changes the final shape of the snowflake this snowflake is a part of the 2025 free crochet snowflake patterns collection see all snowflake patterns here on crochetpedia com 1 the pattern is available in the form of **written instructions** and **video tutorials** for right- and left-handed crocheters 1 https //crochetpedia com/crochet-snowflakes-mini-cal/
